column3: Upon the death of Odiris Appuhamy, Kalawilage Don Somipala, who is the son of
Odiris Appuhamy and the husband of the Plaintiff, came into possession of the said
land and occupied the said land for a long period of time;

Don  Somipala  passed  away 
in  1989  and  thereafter,  the  Plaintiff  has  been 
in
undisturbed and uninterrupted possession of the said land;
By virtue of such long possession, she is the owner of the said land.
